word_mean: 在测量气流噪声或户外噪声时，为防止传声器因气体湍流干扰以及静压力改变而影响其频响特性，在传声器上所罩的风罩。

sentence.Network_en: They drove home with their windshield wipers going whoosh whoosh.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们驱车回家，一路上挡风玻璃上的雨刮器不停地呼呼刮着。

sentence.Network_en: The front windshield was misting over.
sentence.Network_cn: 前面的挡风玻璃上蒙着一层雾。

sentence.Network_en: He brushed the snow off the windshield.
sentence.Network_cn: 他刮掉了挡风玻璃上的雪。

entry.def: The windshield of a car or other vehicle is the glass window at the front through which the driver looks.

means.word_mean: 1. transparent screen (as of glass) to protect occupants of a vehicle

sentences.en: He wiped away the grease from the windshield of the car.
sentences.cn: 他擦去了汽车挡风玻璃上的油渍。

sentences.en: The thick ice has iced the windshields up.
sentences.cn: 厚厚的冰已覆盖了挡风玻璃。

sentences.en: It is dangerous to drive with a dirty windshield.
